system.description:
Stealth: the ability to be unseen and unheard, both while stationary and moving.

Examples: sneaking past a guard is an Opposed throw where the interloper throws Stealth/DEX while the guard throws Recon/INT, or Stealth/INT, whichever is better. Throw Stealth/DEX 8+ to hide from searchlights. Throw Stealth/END 8+ if the character has to hide and stay motionless for long periods. Bypassing more advanced sensors and security systems require specialized equipment and impose higher Target Numbers. Characters without Stealth or Recon roll to spot interlopers unskilled.
system.shortdescr: Training in being unseen and unheard
